page.title: 12MILVERTON COURT
page.content: On the outskirts of Milverton lies Milverton Court,a large farming manor house.The land all around Milverton is owned by the people that live there. Altogether 600 acres are owned. Opposite the house is a little cottage where the men who work on the land live.Down the slope from the house are some cow fields beyond them is a large orchard of 22 acres which has 5000 cider apple trees in it.The land is owned by the people of Milverton Court but the trees are owned by the Taunton Cider Company.The fields are mainly used to grow turnips,wheat and barley.
